PrivacyPage.title: Privacy at Qrydex
PrivacyPage.noTrackingText: Qrydex is a business search engine built on trust. We do not believe in monitoring our users. When you search with us, we do not log your IP address, we do not store your search history linked to you personally, and we do not sell any behavioral data to third parties.
PrivacyPage.noCookiesText: We use no functional cookies or marketing cookies.
PrivacyPage.publicDataText: The information we display about companies is based solely on publicly available data from registries and open websites.
